q: Mitch Daniels , a favorite of Republicans who like Mitch Daniels ' broad experience and fiscal credentials. Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. But Mike Pence also can't afford to wait to decide because has a long way to go in building a fundraising network and a campaign team, and becoming better-known.(

Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . Mr Andy Coulson quit as editor in 2007 saying he took ultimate responsibility for the scandal. He denied knowing phone hacking was taking place. In a statement on Friday, he said it had been a privilege and an honour to work for David Cameron for three-and-a-half years. But he added: "Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role

Sergio Marchionne : e' rinata NEW YORK- I risultati conseguiti da Chrysler lo scorso anno, sia sul fronte dei prodotti sia sul fronte finanziario, hanno superato le aspettative. Lo afferma l'amministratore delegato di Fiat e Chrysler, Sergio Marchionne . "Abbiamo mantenuto la promessa di lanciare 16 nuovi veicoli negli ultimi 12 mesi. R), Dana Point, who sits on the Banking and Budget Committees, said bankruptcy allowed Orange County to work out its problems in the 1990s. But California, she said, is a different matter. I'm a little bit leery of its impact on our state and the rest of our local municipalities, Diane Harkey said. its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., among its fiercest rival.

reports: A group of conservatives led by former Kansas Rep. Jim Ryun plan to start an independent expenditure campaign aimed at getting Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) to run for president. "America's President Committee" will begin a signature-gathering effort this week to encourage Mike Pence to get into the presidential race. Their website, www.theconservativechampion.org, will go live Monday. Mike Pence has gotten buzz

party; commissioner praises QB's behavior DALLAS- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. U.S.-led wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. Donald Rumsfeld wrote that he never authorized waterboarding-- simulated drowning-- but he also called CIA interrogators who used the interrogation technique "patriots, not criminals." The questioning of those in Department of Defence custody provided information that saved innocent American lives. I make no apology for that, he also wrote. NO APOLOGIES Donald Rumsfeld , 78, served as defence secretary in two separate Republican administrations, becoming both the youngest and oldest man to hold the job. Only Vietnam War-era Defence
